result.eng: They pulled down the tallest building.
result.ga: Leag siad an foirgneamh is airde
result.orig: Leag siad an foirgneamh is airde
result.html: Leag siad an foirgneamh is airdeThey pulled down the tallest building.
result.ponchtml: Leag siad an foirgneaṁ is airdeThey pulled down the tallest building.

result.eng: The ball is high in the air.
result.ga: Tá an liathróid ard san aer
result.orig: Tá an liathróid ard san aer
result.html: Tá an liathróid ard san aerThe ball is high in the air.
result.ponchtml: Tá an liaṫróid ard san aerThe ball is high in the air.

result.eng: The accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.
result.ga: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muid
result.orig: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muid
result.html: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muidThe accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a ċeap muidThe accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.

result.eng: He was driving at a high speed.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag tiomáint ar luas ard
result.orig: Bhí sé ag tiomáint ar luas ard
result.html: Bhí sé ag tiomáint ar luas ardHe was driving at a high speed.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag tiomáint ar luas ardHe was driving at a high speed.

result.eng: He managed to reach a high level.
result.ga: D'éirigh leis leibhéal ard a bhaint amach
result.orig: D'éirigh leis leibhéal ard a bhaint amach
result.html: D'éirigh leis leibhéal ard a bhaint amachHe managed to reach a high level.
result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ leis leiḃéal ard a ḃaint amaċHe managed to reach a high level.

result.eng: I love wearing high heavy boots.
result.ga: Is breá liom buataisí arda troma a chaitheamh
result.orig: Is breá liom buataisí arda troma a chaitheamh
result.html: Is breá liom buataisí arda troma a chaitheamhI love wearing high heavy boots.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom buataisí arda troma a ċaiṫeaṁI love wearing high heavy boots.

result.html: Is fear ard éHe's a tall man.
result.ponchtml: Is fear ard éHe's a tall man.

result.html: Tá an cíos ró-ardThe rent is too high.
result.ponchtml: Tá an cíos ró-ardThe rent is too high.

result.ga: Tá mise níos airde ná tusa
result.orig: Tá mise níos airde ná tusa
result.html: Tá mise níos airde ná tusaI am taller than you.
result.ponchtml: Tá mise níos airde ná tusaI am taller than you.

result.eng: Could you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.
result.ga: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadh
result.orig: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadh
result.html: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadhCould you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.
result.ponchtml: An ḃféadfá laḃairt níos airde le do ṫoil Tá an líne ag briseaḋCould you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.

result.eng: She let out a loud scream of laughter.
result.ga: Lig sí liú ard gáire aisti
result.orig: Lig sí liú ard gáire aisti
result.html: Lig sí liú ard gáire aistiShe let out a loud scream of laughter.
result.ponchtml: Lig sí liú ard gáire aistiShe let out a loud scream of laughter.

result.eng: Tall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.
result.ga: Simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéir
result.orig: Simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéir
result.html: Simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéirTall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.
result.ponchtml: Simléirí arda duḃa ag teilgean toite sa spéirTall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.
